attributes.action: Ban the niqab (full Islamic face covering)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that the niqab (full face covering) presents a security risk in the current climate. Currently people are not allowed to wear motorcycle helmets or hoods in certain public places and we believe it is only fair that the same rule should apply to the niqab (which is actually a cultural NOT a religious issue).
